description: Mobile techniques used by GPlayed, ATT&CK software S0536 v1.0
name: GPlayed (S0536)

techniques.comment: [GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can request device administrator permissions.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) has communicated with the C2 using HTTP requests or WebSockets as a backup.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can collect the user’s browser cookies.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) has the capability to remotely load plugins and download and compile new .NET code.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can lock the user out of the device by showing a persistent overlay.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can register for the `BOOT_COMPLETED` broadcast intent.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can wipe the device.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can show a phishing WebView pretending to be a Google service that collects credit card information.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can request the device’s location.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) has base64-encoded the exfiltrated data, replacing some of the base64 characters to further obfuscate the data.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can access the device’s contact list.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can read SMS messages.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)

[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) has used timers to enable Wi-Fi, ping the C2 server, register the device with the C2, and register wake locks on the system.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can send SMS messages.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can collect a list of installed applications.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can collect the device’s model, country, and Android version.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
[GPlayed](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0536) can collect the device’s IMEI, phone number, and country.(Citation: Talos GPlayed)
